name: nextipcelectron
description: A simple npm package boilerplate with TypeScript

scripts.clean: npm run clean-dist && npm run clean-tests
scripts.fresh-build: npm run clean-dist && npm run build
scripts.build:tests: tsc -b tests/tsconfig.json && node scripts/copyStatic.js --src tests --out dist-tests && npm run build:tests:preload
scripts.tests:e2e: npm run build && npm run build:tests && npx playwright test
scripts.fresh-tests:e2e: npm run fresh-build && npm run clean-tests && npm run build:tests && npx playwright test

author: Rowan Van Zyl
